description: Ministry of Labour and Labour Relations - Order for the arbitration for the Industrial Dispute between Mr. K. H. Sunimal and Road Development Authority - Cancellation of the order and order for the new arbitration for the Industrial Dispute between Mr. K. Premarathne and Ceylon Electricity Board - Order for the arbitration for the Industrial Dispute between Mr. S. H. Hemapala and other 16 employees and Ceylon Electricity Board
